item.description:
This is a joint meetup with Social Fun! Many people will be there!

The Living Room is a super cool place near the waterfront. The lounge has large plush sofas and coffee tables arranged to promote good conversation with a place to put your drink.

Check out their website here: http://thelivingroomb...

Let's get together at 6:30PM, just in time for half price appetizers (they go from 4-7PM), plus we'll have a better chance a scoring a couple of good sofas.

Then, the team trivia runs from 8 to 10 PM. Our last meetup at the Living Room was really fun and we tied for first place in Team Trivia!

Hope to see you there!

Patrick
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with the ponytail. There aren't many left these days!
item.name: Team Trivia at the Living Room
